We  have  shown  here  that  "greenfield"  DCF-free  system  infrastructure  is  the  most  efficient  for  100  Gbps  DP-QPSK  transmission  over 
WDM  system.  We  show  that  100  Gbps  DCF-free  transmission  over  1000  km  is  error-free,  while  legacy 
In this paper, we compare through transmission experiments over 1000 km of G.652 fiber the performance of coherent DP-QPSK

The interpretation of complex scenes in images requires knowledge regarding the objects

The interpretation of complex scenes in images often requires (or can bene(cid:147)t from) a model of the scene. This model may
sively reduce the solution domain by excluding assignments that are inconsistent with a
to the objects according to the relations in the structural model. We propose to progres-
constraint network derived from the structural model. The (cid:147)nal segmentation of each
